# Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms

## Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray for Gyms

Electrostatic disinfectant spray has become a game-changer for gyms and fitness centers.

With every company looking for ways to safely allow their customers and members back, gyms have found it particularly tough. So tough that staples in the industry, like Gold’s Gym, are being forced to file for bankruptcy.

When patrons are covered in sweat and touching every piece of equipment, what can be done to disinfect the gym environment safely and quickly? Many gyms are turning to electrostatic disinfection as the answer.

## Safe Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

With electrostatic disinfection, gym staff can safely and quickly disinfect large areas of the gym. A sweep of facilities like showers, locker rooms, backrooms, sauna’s, and more can now be cleaned top-to-bottom without spending hours and hours wiping everything from floor to ceiling.

The same goes for the gym equipment such as racks, weights, and all types of machines. Rather than meticulously disinfecting every surface that gets touched by gym members, a full spraying of the equipment can fully disinfect.

## Thorough Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray

Another huge benefit of electrostatic disinfection is that, as they leave the nozzle, the spray is electrostatically charged which means the disinfectant clings to and completely covers all surfaces they come into contact with. That means all of the hard-to-reach parts of gym equipment that could get passed over during a standard cleaning process.

## Electrostatic Disinfectant Spray Offers Another Line of Defense

Many gyms now offer their members [lots of options to help keep the gyms clean](https://blog.nasm.org/how-to-clean-your-gym): access to disinfectant wipes, sprays, hand washing stations, sanitizer, and more. But, you cannot rely on everyone else to keep your equipment from transmitting diseases and viruses.

Offering a full disinfection is another line of defense against infection and will help instill a sense of safety and trust from your customers and members.

Gyms have become a large talking point for health and safety during this crisis and many have failed to find adequate solutions that allow for the return of their members. But, electrostatic disinfection provides a safe solution that will keep gyms clean, healthy, and open.

To schedule a walkthrough of your fitness center, [**reach out to the electrostatic disinfectant spray specialists at The Heiser Group.**](https://www.heisergroup.com/contact)
